about_the_game:
The Highlander's Outfit is a stylish demon-hunter costume that generates Overdrive from special weapon attacks and lowers their cooldowns.

This DLC unlocks the Highlander's Outfit in the game. You will have to perform a special task to earn the Outfit for your character.
detailed_description:
The Highlander's Outfit is a stylish demon-hunter costume that generates Overdrive from special weapon attacks and lowers their cooldowns.

This DLC unlocks the Highlander's Outfit in the game. You will have to perform a special task to earn the Outfit for your character.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 600 or higher, AMD Radeon 5000 or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 660 or higher, AMD Radeon 7000 or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 600 or higher, AMD Radeon 5000 or higher, Intel HD 4000 or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 660 or higher, AMD Radeon 7000 or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Victor Vran: Highlander's Outfit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 4000 or higher, Intel HD 4000 or higher (min. 512 MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit), Windows 8 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5800 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: The Highlander's Outfit is a stylish demon-hunter costume that generates Overdrive from special weapon attacks and lowers their cooldowns.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Bulgarian
*languages with full audio support
